page.title: 15ABBEY HOUSE -SINAI PARK
page.content: In a ruinous condition-steps are being taken to renovate it.Monks' convalescent home at the time of Burton Abbey.Reputed to have a tunnel leading from the Abbey in Burton to the house. The Lord's Well, in which the monks washed their feet, is situated close by.The monks of Burton played a major part in introducing brewing into the area utilising the highly suitable local water supply. A new private housing development has been built in the immediate vicinity incorporating the use of relevant names e.g. Sinai Close,Lordswell Road.
